column4: im trying to view some dicom images from a xray.. can anyone help me.. gimp wont open it and i d/l the aeskulap and it wont view them either

it isn't a long term solution, but if you need to view them, you could try going into synaptic, search for "dicom" you can use a package called medcon/xmedcon to convert the images to a png or other format supported by gimp so you can at least view the images
the only ones that are in the repos is the ones that you can see from the search results, anything else is unsupported
is "ctn" something else that you're looking for? | ya there could be other repos, but try finding other apps that support viewing dicoms
nvm, I'm sorry but it looks like you're going to have to find a program that isn't included in the default repos
